name: ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC
description: It involves using specialized equipment and software to communicate with the engine control module (ECM) or engine control unit (ECU) of a vehicle to retrieve data and diagnose potential malfunctions or errors.

name: WHEEL ALIGNMENT
description: Wheel alignment, also known as tire alignment, refers to the process of adjusting the angles of the wheels to ensure they are parallel to each other and perpendicular to the ground. Proper wheel alignment is crucial for maintaining vehicle stability, tire performance, and overall handling.

name: OIL CHANGING
description: Oil changing is a routine maintenance procedure for vehicles that involves draining the old engine oil and replacing it with fresh oil. It is essential for the proper functioning and longevity of the engine.

name: BRAKE REPARING
description: Brake repair refers to the process of inspecting, diagnosing, and fixing issues related to the braking system of a vehicle. The braking system is crucial for safe operation, and timely brake repair ensures optimal performance and reliability.

name: COMPLETE ANALYSIS
description: Car washing involves cleaning the exterior surfaces of a vehicle to remove dirt, dust, grime, and other contaminants. It helps maintain the vehicle's appearance and protects the paint and finish.
